dimensions:
Warp: 147.5 cm (58 in.). Weft: 94.5 cm (37 1/4 in.). Both selvedges present.
Pattern: Height of repeat: 103.5 cm. (40 3/4 in.) Height of repeat and height of printing plate are the same.
title: Le Triomphe de Voltaire
provenance: Formerly in the collection of Elinor merrell where it was No. 26 on her list of chefs de piece.
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved plate on plain weave
description: A series of scenes associated with Voltaire including Henry IV crowning Voltaire with laurel, an eagle placing a bust of Voltaire on a pedestal and Voltaire's tomb at Scelliere. All in red on white.
name: Textile with chef de piece
